name: Subligaculum
description:
Subligaculum

Thanks for taking a look at our game! We're a team of ~4 and this is our first Jam together. We've had quite a few issues but we managed to get a game "done" in time. The best way to describe our game would be what one of the devs said: 

"An R34 shows up to the meet, the exterior mostly looks well kept. You pop the bonnet and it's all rusted out the wazoo, rat nests all over the place" 

We kind of forgot about the theme but we managed to get something that barely made sense in the last few hours. 

Controls

Click to attack (Don't click too much though :|)

AD to Move

Space to Jump
